name: foldio-plugin
author: Foldio360

sections.description:
The plugin enables you to Rotate Images in 360 degree RTL or LTR direction. A rotating product image will give viewers a 3D feel.
Capture 36 or more images from each angle, Name them as image-{ Serial number of image captured }.jpg
Upload them all in media library as Bundle
Create Foldio 360 Rotation and insert them in Description section.
Save the Post with snippet.
View in frontend if your theme supports.
In frontend of product, page or post you will see a rotating image.
sections.installation: Manual installation method requires downloading the Fodio 360 plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
